chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:
Once I've seen it, I consider that I made a mistake in the model selection of the article, so I would like to get it in another color. On the other hand, I bought it as an excellent option and it's slightly damaged (it lacks paint on the area where the phone charges and other) and therefore I would like to obtain a refund.

Thank you,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.
The customer meets the following requirements for the return to be processed:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms that they have erased their personal data
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase receipt must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.
Remember: once delivered, the seller has 3 days (5 business days for laptops and appliances) to repair or replace the article and 2 days to make a refund if necessary.

Hello,
My iPhone 13 has an issue:
Again, I called Valientes where I left the package, the iPhone 13, for the courier to pick it up and they told me that the package didn't leave from there, couldn't read the code, and said they would get in touch with me and hasn't been so. In the tracking, it showed it was in Ribarroja and in conversation, once it arrives at the destination, a refund will be made, but it hadn't left yet. I picked up the package and I'll reprint the sheet. Checked the content, sent photos again. It's not exactly clear what the problem is, but I would appreciate an explanation. From my side, I'll do the same thing again. Thanks.
Thanks,

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have been informed that the customer's parcel has been received today 11/6/24. Please confirm receipt of the parcel.

Please note that the refund period is 2 days. If there is no response before 14/6/24, we will refund the customer.

If there is a problem preventing you from resolving this situation, please let us know as soon as possible.

Thank you for helping us to satisfy our customers.

Carelle
Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We are processing the device and will keep you updated. Thank you for your patience

Regards,
AS

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>repaired device<<.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the ""Report a Problem"" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected:
iCloud:
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud
Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

➜ Please provide a solution to the customer within the next (1) business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, tomorrow at morning, according to the Back Market Quality Charter.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Kevin Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

May we confirm if the customer wants a refund or a repair. Has the customer changed their mind about a refund and wants a repair instead? Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
